product.short-description:
The true artisanal techniques and superior ingredients
lead to a uniquely superb New York style texture and taste in our Deli Style Bread. Now MONASH certified Low FODMAP!
product.long-description:
Deli Style Sourdough Bread
The true artisanal techniques and superior ingredients lead to a uniquely superb New York style texture and taste in our gluten free Sourdough Deli Style Bread. Enjoy our high-fiber bread right out of the package, no toasting required. These hearty, extra-large slices are perfect for all your favorite deli sandwiches. Made with a sourdough base, this bread is good for your taste buds, and your gut!  

Storage instructions:
Store in a cool, dry place. Enjoy right out of the package. No toasting required. Packed in a modified atmosphere with oxygen absorber. Previously frozen. Do not refreeze.

page-attributes.page-title: Gluten Free Deli Style Sourdough Bread
page-attributes.page-description: Schär Gluten Free Deli Style Sourdough Bread

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Corn starch, water, sourdough (rice flour, water), buckwheat flour, rice flour, rice syrup, psyllium seed husk (vegetable fiber), rice starch, sunflower oil, soy protein, sorghum flour, modified cellulose, yeast, salt, sugar.

product.short-description: Our Italian style Ciabatta's are packed with ancient grains and crafted with our European recipe.
product.long-description:
Ciabatta
Whether you're craving cheesy paninis or spicy pork sliders, Schär Gluten Free Ciabatta delivers the artisan-style taste and texture you're looking for. Our flavorful Certified Gluten-Free rolls are fortified with vitamins and minerals to provide a hearty, nutritious home for your favorite ingredients. And because it's parbaked, you can finish it in the oven and have fresh, delicious bread on your table in minutes. Just place it in the oven at 400 degrees farenheight for 6-10 minutes.

Storage Instructions : Unopened product can be stored at room temperature until the "best before" date. Once opened, refrigerate in an airtight bag or container and use within 2-3 days. Packed in a modified atmosphere.

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Corn Starch, Water, Corn Flour, Rice flour, Psyllium Seed Husks (vegetable fiber), Dextrose, Modified Cellulose, Soy Protein, Sunflower Oil, Yeast, Salt, Tartaric Acid, Citric Acid.

product.short-description: Our gluten free, Italian style Ciabatta's are packed with ancient grains and seeds and fortified with vitamins and minerals to provide a nutritious, artisan-style roll. Now MONASH certified Low FODMAP!
product.long-description:
Multigrain Ciabatta
These gluten free rolls are packed with ancient grains and seeds and fortified with vitamins and minerals to provide a nutritious, artisan-style roll. Our multigrain ciabatta is high in fiber and free of wheat, lactose, GMOs and preservatives so everyone can enjoy a perfect Italian-style panini with confidence. And because it's parbaked, you can finish it in the oven and have fresh, delicious bread on your table in minutes. Just place it in the oven at 400 degrees farenheight for 6-10 minutes.

Storage Instructions:
Unopened product can be stored at room temperature until the "best before" date. Once opened, refrigerate in an airtight bag or container and use within 2-3 days. Packed in a modified atmosphere.

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Water, Sourdough (Rice flour, Water), Corn starch, Buckwheat flour, Sunflower seeds, Rice flour, Flax seeds, Caramelized sugar cane syrup, Psyllium seed husk (Vegetable fiber), Rice starch, Modified cellulose, Apple juice concentrate, Yeast, Soy protein, Sunflower oil, Salt, Corn flour, Tartaric acid.

product.short-description: Our gluten free Artisan Baker Multigrain bread is baked fresh with an irresistible texture and all the goodness of honey, flax seeds and sunflower seeds.
product.long-description:
Artisan Baker Multigrain Bread
With an irresistible texture and all the goodness of honey, flax seeds and sunflower seeds, you'd never guess that it's Certified Gluten Free. Because our ancient grain bread is free of wheat, lactose, GMOs and preservatives, everyone can enjoy a colorful avocado toast brunch plate with confidence. This bread is never frozen, making it soft and irresistible!

Storage Instructions:
Unopened product can be stored at room temperature until the "best before" date. Once opened, refrigerate in an airtight bag or container and use within 2-3 days. Packed in an inner bag that seals in freshness & goodness.

page-attributes.page-title: Schär Gluten Free Artisan Baker Multigrain Bread
page-attributes.page-description: Schär Gluten Free Artisan Baker Multigrain Bread

product.short-description: This soft and chewy gluten free roll has an amazing taste, made with sourdough and perfect for your next meal!
product.long-description:
Sandwich Rolls
Whether you call them a hoagie, hero, sub, grinder, or simply a sandwich - our fresh, never frozen Sandwich Rolls are the perfect pairing. Our Sandwich Rolls are a good source of fiber and are lactose free, non-GMO, and preservative free.

Storage Instructions:
Unopened product can be stored at room temperature until the "best before" date. Once opened, refrigerate in an airtight bag or container and use within 2-3 days.

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Corn starch, Water, Sourdough (rice flour, water), Rice flour, Psyllium seed husk (vegetable fiber), High oleic sunflower oil, Soy protein, Modified cellulose, Rice starch, Corn germ, Yeast, Rice syrup, Bamboo fiber, Iodized salt (salt, potassium iodide).

product.long-description:
Baguette
Our super soft and chewy baguettes are amazing in taste and texture, perfect for your next sandwich! Crafted with sourdough, we leave out the wheat, lactose, GMOs, and preservatives. And because it's parbaked, you can have it straight out of the bag, or finished in the oven and have fresh, delicious bread on your table in minutes. Just place it on a cooking sheet in the oven at 400 degrees farenheight for 5-7 minutes.

Storage Instructions : Unopened, product can be stored at room temperature until the "best before" date. Once opened, refrigerate in an air tight bag or container and use within 2-3 days.

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Corn starch, Water, Sourdough (rice flour, water), Rice flour, Psyllium seed husk (vegetable fiber), High oleic sunflower oil, Soy protein, Modified cellulose, Rice starch, Corn germ, Yeast, Rice syrup, Bamboo fiber, Iodized salt (salt, potassium iodide).

product.short-description: We're making room for all the delicious possibilities that can be sandwiched between two slices with Schär Gluten Free Artisan Baker White Bread. Made from sourdough, this bread is good for your taste buds, and your gut!
product.long-description:
Artisan Baker White Bread
Our Artisan Baker White bread is baked fresh, and crafted with sourdough, millet, quinoa, and honey. Never frozen, this bread is soft and irresistible! Baked fresh and never frozen, it's hard to believe that this irresistibly soft and flavorful bread is Certified Gluten Free. We leave out the wheat, lactose, GMOs and preservatives so everyone can enjoy that classic BLT, turkey club or traditional holiday stuffing with confidence. 

Storage Instructions:
Unopened product can be stored at room temperature until the "best before" date. Once opened, refrigerate in an airtight bag or container and use within 2-3 days. Packed in an inner bag that seals in freshness & goodness. Best before: see bag closure.

page-attributes.page-description: Schär Gluten Free Artisan Baker White Bread

product.short-description: NEW RECIPE! This American classic is not just perfect for your next BBQ but great as dinner rolls. Made with sourdough, they are also baked with ancient grains, fortified with vitamins and minerals and a good source of fiber.
product.long-description:
Hamburger Buns
NEW RECIPE! On our list of backyard barbecue essentials, Schär Gluten Free Hamburger Buns are right at the top. Made with sourdough, never frozen, and baked with ancient grains and fortified with vitamins and minerals, we took an American classic and made it nutritious and Certified Gluten-Free. Our recipe is high in fiber and free of wheat, lactose, GMOs and preservatives. Even if the grill is retired for the season, our hamburger buns make delicious dinner rolls.

Storage Instructions:
 Unopened product can be stored at room temperature until the "best before" date. Once opened, refrigerate in an airtight bag or container and use within 2-3 days. Packed in a modified atmosphere..

product.short-description: NEW RECIPE! No backyard barbecue or pre-game tailgate is complete without Schär Gluten Free Hot Dog Rolls! With an incredibly soft texture and delicious flavor, you'd never know they're Certified Gluten Free.
product.long-description:
Hot Dog Rolls
NEW RECIPE! We took an American classic, made it gluten free, and fortified it with ancient grains, vitamins, and minerals. Each roll is a good source of fiber. Our recipe is free of wheat, lactose, GMOs and preservatives so everyone in the neighborhood can dig into your grilled masterpieces with confidence.

Storage Instructions:
Unopened product can be stored at room temperature until the "Best Before" date. Once opened use within 2-3 days, or refrigerate in an airtight bag or container.

Plain Bagels

product.long-description:
Artisan Baker 10 Grains & Seeds Bread
We pack a lot of flavor and nutrition into each slice of Schär Gluten Free Artisan Baker 10 Grains & Seeds Bread. This high-fiber recipe is made with sourdough and includes nutritious chia, pumpkin, flax and sunflower seeds plus a touch of honey for an amazing taste and perfect texture. Because our ancient grain bread is never frozen, and free of wheat, lactose, GMOs and preservatives, everyone can enjoy that classic BLT, turkey club or breakfast toast with confidence.

Storage Instructions:
Unopened product can be stored at room temperature until the "best before" date. Once opened, refrigerate in an airtight bag or container and use within 2-3 days. Packed in an inner bag that seals in freshness & goodness.

product.short-description: NEW RECIPE! Launched 04/2020! These shelf-stable Pizza Crusts are so versatile, they are perfect for your next pizza party or used for a panini. Top with your favorite sauce and toppings and enjoy!
product.long-description:
Pizza Crusts
These shelf-stable, gluten free Pizza Crusts are so versatile, they are perfect for your next pizza party or used for a panini. We also leave out the wheat, lactose, GMOs, and preservatives, so everyone can participate in the pizza party. Top with your favorite sauce and toppings and enjoy!

Storage Instructions : Store in a cool, dry place. Once opened, the product must be used the same day.

product.short-description: Whether you're enjoying some sharp cheddar or just want a perfectly plain savory snack, reach for Schär Gluten Free Table Crackers. These saltine-like crackers are light, and easy to digest. Now MONASH certified Low FODMAP!
product.long-description:
Table Crackers
Our versatile crackers have such a light and crispy texture, it's hard to believe that they're Certified Gluten-Free. We also leave out the lactose, wheat, GMOs and preservatives so everyone can enjoy a crunchy cracker with their favorite soup or homemade chili. Each box contains six convenient portion packs that are easy to grab for your next picnic or impromptu road trip.

Storage instructions:
Store in a cool, dry place.

Italian Crostini
This is truly an Italian Crostini, as it's baked in Italy! It is so crunchy, you'll have a very hard time believing that it's gluten free. Perfect for entertaining your guests, and a must have for your kitchen! We leave out the wheat, lactose, preservatives, and GMOs so all of your guests can eat safely.

product.short-description: A light snack, yet high in fibers. Thin and crisp, yet tender and full of taste!
product.long-description:
Multigrain Table Crackers
Always at hand, when that slight sense of hunger pops up in your tummy. The perfect base for all sorts of savory spreads, to be served with a bubbly aperitif … or topped with homemade strawberry jam! Sounds like a dream to you? Well, it's all real! Ce-real, to be more precise. Baked with finest flours, refined with crunchy poppy seeds and sea salt, Schär's Cereal Crackers are a snacker's dream come true ...
A (ce)real delight - at any time and every day!

Store in a cool, dry place.

product.short-description: For those who crave the unbeatable combination of milk chocolate and decadent caramel, Schär Gluten Free Chocolix are the key to indulgence.
product.long-description:
Chocolix
Each Certified Gluten Free cookie bar is filled with silky caramel and coated in milk chocolate. Kids and adults alike will delight in finding a little caramel-chocolate escape in their packed lunch or desk drawer. Free of wheat, GMOs and preservatives, there's no reason not to bring home these charismatic cookie bars. Our Gluten Free Chocolix come in a 3.9 oz. (110 g.) package that contains five bars. Storage instructions: Store in a cool, dry place.

Golden Waffle

A perfect addition to any breakfast or brunch. This light & crispy texture paired with the typical squares allow for optimal topping storage. Savory or sweet, your options are endless! Popular toppings include ice cream, hazelnut spread, fresh fruits, whipped cream and more. And who can forget the popular chicken and waffles!

product.long-description:
Ladyfingers
These shelf-stable, gluten free Ladyfingers are great for snacking, but even better for tiramisu! Schär Ladyfingers are the only gluten free ladyfingers on the market, so make them yours today! We leave out the wheat, gluten, GMOs, preservatives, and lactose. Be sure to check out the great, authentic Italian recipe for tiramisu on the back of the packaging!

Storage instructions:
Store in a cool, dry place.

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Eggs, sugar, corn starch, rice flour, guar gum, natural vanilla flavor.

product.short-description: America's favorite pasta shape - gluten free and made in Italy!
product.long-description:
Spaghetti
This classic from Italy is perfect for your gluten free spaghetti and meatball dish. Our recipe is crafted free of gluten, GMOs, eggs, lactose, and preservatives. 

Storage instructions:
Store in a cool, dry place.

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Corn flour, rice flour, vegetable palm oil.

product.short-description: Gluten free Pasta - made in Italy!
product.long-description:
Fusilli
The classic yet fun, corkscrew-shaped gluten free pasta from Italy is perfect for any hearty or light pasta recipe. Our recipe is crafted free of gluten, GMOs, eggs, lactose, and preservatives. 

Storage instructions:
Store in a cool, dry place.

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Corn flour, rice flour, vegetable palm oil.

product.long-description:
Penne
The classic shaped gluten free pasta from Italy can be perfectly paired with any sauce, light or hearty. Bring a taste of Italy home! Our recipe is crafted free of gluten, GMOs, eggs, lactose, and preservatives. 

Storage instructions:
Store in a cool, dry place.

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Corn flour, rice flour, vegetable palm oil.

product.short-description: These delicious, crispy, and gluten free wafers are filled with exquisite hazelnut cream and coated in luscious German chocolate! Each pack includes 3 individually wrapped bars per pack, perfect for on the go! For an extra special treat, try them frozen for a delightful cool treat.
product.long-description:
Chocolate Hazelnut Bars

These delicious, crispy, and gluten free wafers are filled with exquisite hazelnut cream and coated in luscious German chocolate! Each pack includes 3 individually wrapped bars per pack, perfect for on the go! For an extra special treat, try them frozen for a delightful cool treat.

Storage instructions:
Store in a cool, dry place.

page-attributes.page-description: Schär Gluten Free Chocolate Hazelnut Bars

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Milk chocolate (sugar, cocoa butter, skimmed milk powder, cocoa mass, dried milk fat, whey powder, soy lecitihin, natural vanilla flavor), sugar, vegetable fats (palm, palm kernel), corn flour, potato starch, hazelnut cream, whey powder, cocoa powder, soy lecithin, salt, guar gum, baking soda.

product.short-description: This gluten free crispy wafer is covered in smooth, European milk chocolate. Each pack comes with 3 individually wrapped bars, perfect on the go!
product.long-description:
Twin Bar
Two bars means double the deliciousness! Crisp, gluten free wafers smothered in decadent, European milk chocolate. Each pack has 3 individually wrapped Twin Bars, perfect for an on the go treat. Whether you're taking one for lunch, or indulging in some chocolate after dinner, this is the perfect treat!

Storage instructions : Store in a cool, dry place.

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Milk chocolate (sugar, cocoa butter, whole milk powder, cocoa mass, soy lecithin, natural flavor (vanilla)), palm fat, sugar, rice flour, potato starch, teff flour, soy flour, low fat cocoa powder, soy lecithin, coconut oil, egg yolk, salt, baking soda.

product.short-description: Your secret ingredient for amazing, gluten free creations. A staple in every kitchen.
product.long-description:
Breadcrumbs
This chef recommended, pantry essential is perfect for your next recipe. Gluten free breadcrumbs will give you the freedom to make all your favorite, like fried chicken again! Non-GMO & Preservative-Free!

Storage instructions:
Store in a cool, dry place.

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Rice flour, corn starch, soy flour, palm fat, eggs, corn syrup, guar gum, yeast, salt.

product.short-description:
Who said the perfect gluten free Holiday Gifting Bundle doesn't exist? This bundle is being offered for a special price of $26 - a $31 value!

But hurry, this offer can be enjoyed now, but ends Tuesday, December 15th to guarantee delivery before Christmas. Don't forget shipping is free on orders of $49 or more!
product.long-description:
Holiday Gifting Bundle
Give the gift of gluten free this holiday season with this special Holiday Gifting Bundle!

In this special discounted bundle you'll find:

  • 1 Chocolate Honeygrams
  • 1 Entertainment Crackers
  • 1 Rosemary Table Crackers
  • 1 Speculoos Cookie
  • 1 Breadcrumbs

So what are you waiting for? Let's spread some cheer!

But remember:
This is a limited time offer and it ends Tuesday, December 15th!
So hurry to get this bundle for the special price of $26 - a $31 value!
(See offer Details below)

Offer valid to receive $5.00 in savings only on each purchase of the specific Dr. Schar gluten-free product bundle referenced, and only on orders placed at Holiday Gifting Bundle between 9 a.m. EST on, Tuesday, December 1, 2020 - 11:59 p.m. EST on Tuesday, Decebember 15, 2020.
Promotional price of $26.00 includes sales tax and handling charges, excludes shipping costs.
Orders placed by December 15, 2020 will be scheduled for delivery in continental U.S. by Thursday, December 24th, 2020.
All products are subject to standard limited product warranty. Valid only while supplies last.

product.short-description: Start your Low Fodmap diet with this starter kit from Schar! All products are certified low FODMAP from Monash University.
product.long-description:
Low FODMAP Starter Kit Bundle
A low FODMAP diet can help reduce digestive symptoms, specifically for those suffering from IBS. Whether you'll try the ciabatta bread, pizza crust, or Multigrain cracker first, this starter kit can help you lead a happier, healthier you!

In this special discounted bundle you'll find:

  • 1 Deli Style Seeded Bread
  • 1 Pizza Crust
  • 1 Multigrain Crackers
  • 1 Crispbread
  • 1 Multigrain Ciabatta



But remember:
This is a limited time offer and it ends Monday, March 15th!
So hurry to get this bundle for the special price of $26 - a $31 value!
(See offer Details below)
